thread.title: New Orleans officer suspended: arrested on battery charge
thread.title_full: New Orleans officer suspended: arrested on battery charge - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: New Orleans officer suspended: arrested on battery charge
text:
NEW ORLEANS (AP) - New Orleans police say an 11-year veteran has been suspended without pay after being arrested at his Chalmette home on a domestic battery charge.
St. Bernard Parish records show that 40-year-old Robert Hurst is being held until a bond appearance Friday. They show that Hurst's girlfriend told deputies he choked, slapped, punched, pushed and bit her during an argument Wednesday.
Hurst was arrested last year on charges of attempted second-degree murder and simple battery related to allegations of domestic abuse. However, those charges were dropped. Attorney Eric Hessler told The New Orleans Advocate in July 2014 that the charges were baseless and were made by an ex-girlfriend.
Hessler could not be immediately reached Thursday to learn if he is representing Hurst again. His secretary said he was in court.
